nl.inl.blacklab.search

Class CompleteQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.search.CompleteQuery

  • public class CompleteQuery
extends Object
    Represents a combination of a contents query (a TextPattern) and a metadata "filter query" (a regular Lucene Query). This kind of query is produced by parsing SRU CQL, for example.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CompleteQuery(TextPattern pattern, org.apache.lucene.search.Query filter)

    • Method Detail

      • pattern

        public TextPattern pattern()
        Get the query to find a structure in the contents
        Returns:
        the structural contents query

      • filter

        public org.apache.lucene.search.Query filter()
        Get the query that determines what documents to search for the structure
        Returns:
        the metadata filter query

      • and

        public CompleteQuery and(CompleteQuery other)
        Combine this query with another query using the and operator. NOTE: contents queries will be combined using token-level and, filter queries will be combined using BooleanQuery (so, at the document level).
        Parameters:
        other - the query to combine this query with
        Returns:
        the resulting query

      • or

        public CompleteQuery or(CompleteQuery other)
        Combine this query with another query using the or operator. NOTE: you can combine two content queries or two filter queries, or both, but you can't combine one content query and one filter query.
        Parameters:
        other - the query to combine this query with
        Returns:
        the resulting query

      • not

        public CompleteQuery not(CompleteQuery other)
        Combine this query with another query using the and-not operator. NOTE: contents queries will be combined using token-level and-not, filter queries will be combined using BooleanQuery (so, at the document level).
        Parameters:
        other - the query to combine this query with
        Returns:
        the resulting query
